channel.title: Server help
channel.description: I have an evilscape server already. I downloaded the adventurescape source to check it out I clicked compile and runserver and it wouldn't let me log on so I made it's own no-ip and port forwarded and gave it it's own port.. But, when I would try and sign on it would log me onto my evilscape source server.. even though my runserver file says that the adventurescape server is running can someone help me?

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

right port and u have 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

I have an evilscape server already. I downloaded the adventurescape source to check it out I clicked compile and runserver and it wouldn’t let me log on so I made it’s own no-ip and port forwarded and gave it it’s own port… But, when I would try and sign on it would log me onto my evilscape source server… even though my runserver file says that the adventurescape server is running can someone help me?
